text: allah obava (arambhayedi) khelahina vu tatvayaka utpadanaya karanneya. (ema) khelahinayen pasu, ohuva (taruna) saktiyada laba denneya. (ema) saktiyen pasu (idunu kes valin yutu) mahalubhavayada, khelahinatvayada laba denneya. ohu taman kÃ¦mati prakara ese (obava) utpadanaya karanneya. ohu (siyalla) hondin danneku ha itamat balasampannayeku vasayen sitinneya
